name: Ad astra per aspera
description:
Controls:

Move: Mouse 🖱️

Shoot (bullet needed): LMB (Left Mouse Button)

Story:

You are a scientist.

   🧑‍🔬

And you have developed an amazing device that can change the size of any object.

After all the experiments your best disciple stole all your blueprints and devices. He become very small, smaller that atoms, and he have made you the size of galaxies. But your futuristic device has one unexpected feature. The user can be huge for a limited time. Some time later, it begins to rapidly decrease until it becomes subatomic in size.

   ⚛️

This is a great opportunity to catch the villain and return everything to its original state. Be hasty and try get to the right places to reduce the size on your spaceship and defeat the threat to the entire Universe! 💫
